trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around July 6th 2009
Summary: Bizarre, bone-chilling, and gave me goosebumps...
divs: sighting detailsstory: [pictures are in day-time just to give you a better view of what happened. no ufo pics] i was on my front porch smoking a extremely disgusting cigarette. so, to save myself i was going to go down to my sisters truck to grab a marb. as i was going down the stairs i flicked my lighter a few times until it lit. as it was lit for about 2 or 3 seconds these lights shown through the trees (picture 1: the lights were to the right of the opening [on the left side of the pic] in the trees shining through) i would say there was about 3 or 4 lights. i stood there watching anxiously, and adrenaline pumping throughout my body. it moved after about 2 or 3 seconds into the clearing (picture 2) in a medium speed. what really blew my mind was how quiet it was for being so close. there was no noise at all, all i could hear was my fast breathing and heavily beating heart. as i watched it moved above the trees behind my shed, and it shone through them. the light was bright enough to illuminate the trees but not the ground. i couldn't tell what kind of shape this was all in all because the lights were hiding it. i was shocked.. scared.. and shaking. and for a big dude like me, its hard to scare. i ran up the stairs and into the house and told my mom.. she didn't believe me and her first reaction was, "what did you smoke now?" i wasn't under the influence of anything. i was shooken and kept having these chills go up my back throughout the hour after. the only reason i could give for seeing this event would probably be when i was at my cousins house about four weeks ago. he is into this ufo crap, and hes encountered something really weird, but i won't get into that. we were sitting on the backporch watching the sky and he told me you tell them with your mind that you want to see them and they will eventually come. i didn't believe him. but i tried it, and i really wanted to see one though. well low and behold 4 weeks later i'm typing on mufon about a ufo report. i'm going to keep trying to see them everynight now. and i have more of a respect for the unknown. with the lunar eclipse coming tomorrow and the crop circles they produce warning\teaching us of how to predict astronomical events, i have nothing to be afraid of. they're trying to help us, as far as i know. but, all in all this was the most freakish and bizarre thing i have ever seen...... it was silent and bright. i just want to know 1.why they were at my house (because the "calling the aliens" thing probably didn't do anything). 2. why did they leave when they saw the lighter (obviously they're intelligent) and 3. do they have something to do with my sisters time warp? about a month and a half ago.. my sister was woken up by her dog at about 2 am i think she said, and she took him outside to pee. an hour later she woke up in the bathroom with the dog. and she is the lightest sleeper, and she has never slept walked. i mean i live in a pretty wilderness environment, could this just be a good place for the unknown to dwell at night? i don't know. i hope someone contacts me. thank you, cody
